title: Sword of Screams
content:
Sword of Screams Uncommon 2~12 Damage 1d8Piercing+ 1d4 Psychic Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A blade of flawless craft. As is parts the air, you fancy you can hear a faint, whispering shriek... Rapier Finesse 0.9 130

Sword of Screams

1d8Piercing+ 1d4 Psychic

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A blade of flawless craft. As is parts the air, you fancy you can hear a faint, whispering shriek...

Sword of Screams is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3
